Mr. Speaker, I rise to speak in support of H.R. 973, the Setting  Consumer Standards for Lithium-Ion Batteries Act.

This legislation will protect Americans from fires caused by lithium- ion batteries. It directs the Consumer Product Safety Commission to  require…

…products covered by       the Consumer Product Safety Act and S. 389 would require the       Consumer Product Safety Commission (CPSC) to adopt voluntary       safety standards for lithium-ion batteries.
